Automaton Abomination

12 HP, 5 CHA, Whirling Blades (d8 Blast)

• Horrific multi limbed amalgamation of other automatons it has cannibalized

• Slow but relentless, makes constant scraping noises as it moves

• Needs your limbs for spare parts (grab a character, d10, lose a limb)

• Upon taking critical damage, splits into two smaller Abominations with half stats, 6 HP, Stabbing Blades (d6)

category: monsters source: discord
